name: Mysterious AR
description:
Mysterious AR is a challenging puzzle in augmented reality. Unleash the full potential of iOS 11.

"'Mysterious AR' Is a Neat Looking Upcoming 'The Room'-Like AR Game" -- TouchArcade

"Mysterious AR looks like a really cool use of AR with some puzzling elements." -- Pockergamer

Main features:

* Mysterious AR uses CoreML and Vision to recognize real-world objects.

* Open portals with your portal gun. You can freely move through the portals.

* Puzzles like you've never seen them.

* Interactive augmented reality!

Download now! Crack the puzzles and use the portal gun at your own risk.
